summary.name: Explorers
summary.description: You’re taking your first steps into a world of playful intimacy. Fun, light, and simple challenges await you—perfect to break the ice together and spark new sensations!

quests.content: Caress and kiss each other while standing for 2 minutes.
Write something that turns you on on a note and exchange them at the end of the next turn.
Your partner writes a sexy word on your body with their fingertips, and you have to guess it.
Caress each other with your eyes closed for 2 minutes.
Communicate one of your fantasies to your partner using only body language.

Sit on your partner’s back and give them a massage for 2 minutes.
Gently undress the other player until they’re down to their underwear.
Your partner leaves you in your underwear and kisses your whole body for 1 minute.
Take turns whispering a fantasy you’d like to try.
Your partner chooses your outfit for the rest of the game.
Commit to not holding back any moans or words during sexual acts for the rest of the game.
Cool your hands with cold water and caress your partner’s body (in underwear) for 1 minute.
Turn off all lights and make out while caressing each other’s naked bodies for 2 minutes.
Try to listen to your partner’s heartbeat and masturbate them in sync with the rhythm for 2 minutes.
Lie side by side and masturbate each other for 2 minutes.
Masturbate each other for 1 minute while keeping your faces close but without kissing.
Masturbate your partner while also masturbating yourself for 2 minutes.
End the game in any way you prefer.
Conclude the game with penetrative sex in any position you like.
Masturbate the other player until they reach orgasm.
